alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 8:59AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. Louis County through 930 AM CDT... At 859 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hibbing, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cherry around 915 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Buhl, Virginia, Eveleth and Gilbert. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
